CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Street__c)), Street__c & BR(),'') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(City__c)), City__c & BR(),'') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(State__c)), State__c & BR(),'') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Zip_Postal_Code__c)), Zip_Postal_Code__c & BR(),'') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Country__c)), Country__c & BR(),'')
CustomField.label: Address
